actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the duty-free treatment of the copper content of all copper-bearing ores; to permanently suspend the duty on copper waste, copper scrap, and certain forms of copper; to repeal the market price test for determining rates of duty on copper-bearing materials; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free treatment of the copper content of all copper-bearing ores. Makes permanent the existing suspension of duty on copper waste, copper scrap, and certain forms of copper. Repeals the market price test for determining rates of duty on copper-bearing materials. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill to provide for the duty-free treatment of the copper content of all copper-bearing ores; to permanently suspend the duty on copper waste, copper scrap, and certain forms of copper; to repeal the market price test for determining rates of duty on copper-bearing materials; and for other purposes.
